title:
Planck stars, White Holes, Remnants and Planck-mass quasi-particles. The
  quantum gravity phase in black holes' evolution and its manifestations
abstract:
This is a review of some recent developments on quantum gravity aspects of
black hole physics. In particular, we focus on a scenario leading to the
prediction of the existence of a Planck-mass quasi-stable object, that could
form a component of dark matter.
